# Validation.Rmd

```{r}

# import function
source("../function.R")

# import libraries
library(dplyr)
library(readr)

dat <-read.csv("./ValidationData.csv", header=T, sep=",", stringsAsFactors=FALSE, encoding="UTF-8")

dat_split <- dat %>% 
  group_split(description) %>%
   group_map(CheckIfDfFollowsStandard1())

lapply(dat_split, FUN = function(X) CheckIfDfFollowsStandard1(dat_split))
CheckIfDfFollowsStandard1(dat_split[[1]])

```
